data.message: I don't know if it is your camera or the fact I won't download your game apps but I am getting tired of being in the middle of a game and Bam!!! I am back to my homepage instead of in the game. Your new help on the page sucks when I am no longer there so I can't use it!

replies.message: Hi Barbara. Apps and games are managed by developers outside of Facebook. If you need help with an app or game, contact the developer directly. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/2osHUtQ. -Jessica
